decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class A of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class A. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:Drawing no 2243 -01 (Site Location Plan) Dated 15 /02/2023
Drawing no. 2243 -03 (Proposed Floor Plans, Proposed Elevations & Section B-B Plan) Dated 08/02/2023

Condition : 4 - 1.It is a requirement of paragraph A.3 of the above legislation that the materials used in any exterior work (other than materials used in the construction of the conservatory) shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse.

Condition : 5 - 2  .It is a requirement of condition A.4 that the development shall be carried out in accordance with the information that the developer provided to the local planning authority, unless the local planning authority and the developer agree otherwise in writing. It is a requirement of condition A.4 that the development shall be carried out in accordance with the submitted drawings and information that the developer provided to the local planning authority, unless the local planning authority and the developer agree otherwise in writing.

Condition : 6 - ADVICE NOTE
(1)It is no longer a requirement that the development shall be completed on or before 30th May 2019.

Condition : 7 - (2)It is no longer a requirement that the developer notifies the local planning authority of the completion of the development as soon as reasonably practicable after completion, in writing including (a) the name of the developer, (b) the address or location of the development, and (c) the date of completion
description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH THE FOLLOWING DIMENSIONS: EXTENDS BEYOND THE REAR WALL OF THE ORIGINAL DWELLINGHOUSE BY 6 M. THE MAXIMUM HEIGHT OF THE ENLARGED PART OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE WILL BE 3.24 M. THE HEIGHT OF THE EAVES OF THE ENLARGED PART OF THE DWELLINGHOUSE WILL BE 3 M.
